meanings.definition: To separate or disconnect (something) from a link or connection.
meanings.sent1: I delinked the old printer from the computer.
meanings.sent2: The chain was delinked, causing the gate to swing open.
meanings.sent3: The magician delinked the rings, making them float in mid-air.
meanings.sent4: She delinked herself from the toxic relationship, feeling free at last.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic delinked the faulty wire, restoring power to the machine.

meanings.definition: Not connected or associated with something else.
meanings.sent1: The delinked document had no references to other sources.
meanings.sent2: The delinked website had no hyperlinks to external pages.
meanings.sent3: The delinked puzzle pieces made it impossible to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: The delinked phone was unable to access the internet.
meanings.sent5: The delinked train car stood alone on the tracks, waiting for repairs.
